plot outline: This is a story of Shree who reside somewhere in the chawls of MUMBAI. Unlike any other chawl house, Shree was staying in a small house and having multiple problems to deal with which made him worried and stressed. One day he found a partner who guides him to deal Shree with his problems.
title: Shree Partner
